content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case involves a cost procedure and the decision was made on may 28 2014 the parties are discussing the division of goods between two expartners the total value of the goods is 2529600 eur including a real estate property the goods will be split equally between the plaintiff and the defendant the decision is based on a specific law called the civil procedure act section 306 the court settlement is confidential and cannot be disclosed no translation of the document is available

metadata.CASE_ID: Okrožno sodišče v Ljubljani, settlement P 516/2014 - II, 28. 5. 2014-II
